builds.installCommand: echo '=== Instalando dependencias ===' && cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../Nuevo_back && npm ci
builds.buildCommand: echo '=== Construyendo frontend ===' && cd frontend && npm run build && echo '=== Moviendo dist al backend ===' && rm -rf ../Nuevo_back/dist && cp -r dist ../Nuevo_back/dist
builds.startCommand: echo '=== Iniciando backend ===' && cd Nuevo_back && npm run start
